title: Mooring Deck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Thai, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Shrimp/fish sauce is the only non-veg item. Cafe serving vegetarian food, with always at least one vegan choice. Owner speaks English and can explain the menu and is also able to change some of the recipes to your preferences. There are also vegan sweets like parfait and chocolate cake or muffin which you can also take away.
